title: Elementary Mathematics Teacher Coaching: Practice-Based Instructional Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary and secondary mathematics curriculum knowledge, basic teaching skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on improving digital-based lesson design and implementation skills through coaching in real classroom settings.

learning_goals: The frequency of teachers eliciting student thinking increases by over 50% after coaching sessions
The rate of open-ended questioning improves by over 40%
The repertoire of instructional strategies for supporting meaning construction expands by at least three types
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
